name: Hansons Marathon Method 2nd Edition
description: Prepare your mind and body for the whole race, not just the easier early kilometres. This training guide features precisely paced speed work and shorter, harder runs that remold your muscles for long-lasting endurance. Focuses on a foundation of consistent training and cumulative fatigue to prepare you for the hardest last kilometres of the marathon.

Author: Luke Humphrey, Keith Hanson, Kevin Hanson
